Brian Scaturro

Fancy a dance?

Why hello there! I am Brian of clan Scaturro - a proud and noble tribe.

I suppose I could be called a programmer. I write programs, usually of the web variety. I spend an inordinate amount of time doing such activities...

On the off chance that I am not programming or reading about said gramming, I am likely spending time with my beautiful wife and baby boy in the Grandest of Rapids!

I love Jesus.

Hang out with me on Github or bombard me with @ symbols on twitter.
